articles.title: President Donald Trump (Jr.)?
articles.description: CNN's Chris Cillizza breaks down the political aspirations of Donald Trump Jr. Watch The Point with Chris Cillizza on Youtube with new episodes every Tuesday and Thursday.

articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.title: Donald Trump wants the iPhone home button back
articles.description: President Donald Trump seems to have recently switched to an iPhone without a home button, and he doesn’t seem to like it very much. So much so that he decided to casually subtweet Apple CEO Tim Cook with a bit of light tech commentary.
articles.content: Photo by Mark Wilson/Getty Images President Donald Trump seems to have recently switched to an iPhone without a home button, and he doesn’t seem to like it very much. So much so that he decided to casually subtweet Apple CEO Tim Cook with a bit of light tech … [+786 chars]

articles.description: The Turkish president got what he wanted — as did Russia and Iran.

articles.title: Donald Trump’s ‘Lynching’
articles.description: The president lives to celebrate his own victimhood. What’s Lindsey Graham’s excuse?

articles.author: Jody Rosen
articles.title: Staring Down Donald Trump, the Same Elephant in Every Room
articles.description: We all know what it’s like to be ambushed by the president, at least in our Twitter feeds. That’s why a clip of Greta Thunberg scowling at him went viral.
articles.content: Famous, powerful people are known to make grand entrances. It is part of the gig. But Trumps way of lurching into a room is inseparable from his propensity for creating chaos and obliterating meaning. Thank you very much, thank you very much, he booms as he s… [+2046 chars]

articles.title: Analysis: Donald Trump should probably stop talking now
articles.description: It seemed like every time you turned your TV on this week, Donald Trump was talking about Ukraine.
articles.content:
THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE! 
In each episode of his weekly YouTube show, Chris Cillizza will delve a little deeper into the surreal world of politics. Click to subscribe!
